tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TradingStrategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
  buy_threshold DECIMAL,
  sell_threshold DECIMAL,
  stop_loss DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE trading_strategies (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 strategy_name TEXT,
 parameter1 FLOAT,
 parameter2 FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE strategy_logs (
 log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 strategy_id INT,
 log_description TEXT,
 log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE strategy_parameters (
 parameter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 parameter_name TEXT,
 parameter_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE executed_trades (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT,
    trade_date DATE,
    trade_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    trade_qty INT,
    trade_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
